title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app 53
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app 53

State Regulations

Mercury Bearing Wastes that may be Processed in Exempt

Mercury Recovery Units

Appendix XIII to 40 CFR part
266, as of July 1, 2002, is
incorporated by reference as if fully set forth herein (see section
370.1
[e]
of this

Title). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, Appendices, app
53

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
